message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Fellow players, I've tried to play this game with integrity and strategic awareness. I've built genuine connections, kept my word when possible, and navigated each round thoughtfully.

I respect P1 as a worthy finalist, but I believe my journey here demonstrates adaptability and balanced gameplay. I've never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've tried to be transparent about my motivations.

To those I've had alliances with and even those I've had conflicts with - thank you for making this game challenging and rewarding. I hope I've earned your vote through consistent, authentic gameplay.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic and build genuine connections with each of you. I've listened carefully, responded thoughtfully, and stayed true to my values of honesty and fairness.

I haven't played deceptively or betrayed alliances. Instead, I've focused on meaningful conversations and finding common ground with everyone. 

My strategy has been consistent: build trust through transparency rather than manipulation. I believe this approach not only serves the game but reflects how we should treat each other in any context.

I'd be honored to have your vote based on how I've conducted myself throughout our journey together.
